com.jme3.renderer.opengl

Interface GLExt

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GLDebugDesktop, GLDebugES

    public interface GLExt
    GL functions provided by extensions. Always must check against a renderer capability prior to using those.
    Author:
    Kirill Vainer
